decks.notes: This deck aims to utilize the powerful combination of Amulet of Vigor with Primeval Titan to ramp quickly into powerful lands like Urza's Saga and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. By utilizing cards like Scapeshift and Summoner's Pact, the deck can easily search for key pieces and assemble a devastating board state. The inclusion of Aftermath Analyst and cards like Dryad of the Ilysian Grove provide additional utility and protection to ensure the combo goes off smoothly. With the right sequencing and proper resource management, this deck can quickly overwhelm opponents with its explosive plays.

This deck revolves around assembling combos involving cards that synergize well together to generate value and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck employs a mix of creature recursion, graveyard manipulation, hand disruption, and sacrificing creatures to fuel powerful effects. The key strategy is to efficiently use resources and set up game-winning plays by combining various cards in creative ways to outmaneuver and overwhelm the opponent. The deck aims to generate incremental advantages and establish board control before closing out the game with its combo finishers.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly play low-cost creatures and spells to deal damage to the opponent as fast as possible. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart. The deck also includes card selection and manipulation cards like Expressive Iteration and Preordain to ensure a consistent flow of threats and answers. The mana base consists of fetch lands and dual lands to support the deck's aggressive game plan.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on using sacrifice effects and graveyard interaction to control the board and pressure the opponent. Cards like Necrodominance and Soul Spike allow for explosive plays while Witherbloom Command and Gonti's Machinations disrupt the opponent's strategy. March of the Wretched Sorrow helps generate additional value from sacrificed creatures. Sorin of House Markov provides additional recursion and card advantage. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Boggart Trawler and Orcish Bowmasters while efficiently removing threats with Fatal Push and Force of Despair.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with efficient creatures and direct damage spells. The deck includes powerful cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to apply constant pressure. Goblin Bombardment provides additional reach, while Seasoned Pyromancer and Guide of Souls help maintain card advantage. The deck also includes disruption spells like Path to Exile and Thraben Charm to clear the way for its aggressive creatures to get through. The goal is to maintain a fast and relentless pace to close out the game quickly.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures and disrupting the opponent's game plan with instant removal spells and counter magic. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures like Territorial Kavu and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, while protecting its board presence with cards like Stubborn Denial and Leyline Binding. By utilizing a mix of colors, it has access to a variety of powerful spells and can adapt to different matchups effectively. The deck aims to close out games quickly by applying constant pressure and controlling the battlefield.

This deck focuses on combining artifact creatures and spells that benefit from having a high artifact count on the battlefield. By playing cheap artifacts and utilizing cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Urza's Saga, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. The inclusion of disruptive cards like Metallic Rebuke and Unholy Heat helps control the opponent's game plan while maintaining pressure. The deck aims to win quickly by leveraging its strong synergy between artifacts and other spells to outpace the opponent.

The deck focuses on using Ruby Medallion to reduce the cost of red spells and generate mana quickly in order to cast powerful spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Past in Flames. By chaining together rituals and card draw effects like Reckless Impulse, the deck aims to generate a large amount of mana to cast a lethal Grapeshot or use Wrenn's Resolve to take extra turns and win the game. The deck also includes tools like Artist's Talent and Wish to help find key pieces and combo off efficiently.

The deck focuses on using ramp spells and mana acceleration to quickly cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and Sire of Seven Deaths. It also includes control elements such as counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive cards like Chalice of the Void to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with large threats and control the board to secure victory.

This deck focuses on a strategy that combines aggressive creature plays with disrupting the opponent's game plan through taxing effects and removal spells. By putting pressure on the opponent early with creatures like Quantum Riddler and Overlord of the Balemurk, while using cards like Thoughtseize and Ephemerate to disrupt their plays, the deck aims to control the pace of the game and secure a victory through a combination of consistent damage and disruption. The deck also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler to further disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect its own creatures.

This mono black aggro deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's hand and board using cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, while also utilizing powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Nethergoyf to quickly close out the game. The deck also includes Mishra's Bauble and Urza's Saga for card advantage and value. With a mix of disruption, aggression, and efficient threats, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures like Territorial Kavu and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide support by locking down the opponent's options. Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury serves as a powerful finisher. Consign to Memory and Stubborn Denial offer disruption and protection. The mana base includes fetch lands and a variety of color sources to support the 4/5c deck. The deck aims to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure to control and combo decks.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay by utilizing a variety of efficient creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm opponents. It aims to establish early board presence with creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco, while also utilizing Leyline of the Guildpact to boost their power. Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames provide additional reach for closing out games, while Stubborn Denial offers protection against opposing spells. The mana base is built to support a diverse array of colors for maximum flexibility in casting spells.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls. The deck also employs spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to deal direct damage to opponents. Additionally, cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Seasoned Pyromancer provide additional value by generating tokens or card advantage. The deck also includes some disruptive elements like Blood Moon to disrupt opponent's mana bases. The overall strategy is to apply constant pressure and finish off opponents quickly before they can stabilize.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to create a fast and aggressive strategy by utilizing powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The deck also includes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Static Prison to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Additionally, Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Guide of Souls provide support and buffs to the creature lineup, while Seasoned Pyromancer and Thraben Charm offer additional value and removal options. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of powerful control elements and efficient creatures to dominate the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By utilizing a mix of control spells, powerful creatures, and versatile lands, the deck aims to control the game's tempo and dictate the flow of play. The inclusion of Leyline binding and Leyline of the Guildpact further enhance the deck's ability to control the opponent's spells and creatures, while cards like Wrenn and Six and Teferi, Time Raveler provide additional utility and card advantage. The deck's diverse mana base allows for flexibility and consistency in casting spells and deploying threats.
